text: [Music]
hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with some breaking news both good
and bad but mostly good a little bit of
bad news is that there's no new video
recipe uploads this week but that's
because of the good news which is
starting next week every time we upload
a new recipe video will provide a link
to not only the ingredients but a fully
formatted written recipe which of course
will be published by my good friends
over at all recipes so that should be
great news for everybody who's requested
that which i think is everybody and yes
this also has something to do with our
big announcement yesterday which is that
we're now offering a premium membership
and i will include a link below in the
description in case you missed
yesterday's big announcement and want to
read the blog post explaining what's
going on but in the meantime if you
haven't joined yet please do and like i
said we'll be back posting two new
recipe videos next week complete with a
link to the fully formatted written
recipe whether you remember or not so
stay tuned for that and as always enjoy
you
